EmailTemplate.name: HEVT-202307-xSEG-FRM-POST-FORUM.Email #3 v1 Registrants (Forum 2023 Replay: Feat
EmailTemplate.subject: Forum 2023 Replay: Featured Content
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hi {{lead.First Name:default=Attendee}},
Forum 2023 has come to a close and we’ve been reflecting on all the things that made this year’s event extra special. The energy was palpable, the discussion was amazing and being together with nearly 350 people, from more than 150 organizations, pioneering what’s next in virtual care was incredible.
Check out our first three session articles summarizing some of the most valuable dialogue caught on stage:
How AI Helps Clinicians and Consumers Reach Health Goals <[[https://forum.teladochealth.com/how-ai-helps-clinicians-and-consumers-reach-health-goals?&utm_source=marketo&utm_medium=email&utm_content=&utm_term=&utm_campaign=HEVT-202307-xSEG-FRM-LIVE-EVENT&utm_campaign_id=/]]> Leaders across industries tackle the burning topic of generative AI, including its increasingly powerful capabilities, its role in healthcare, and guidelines for responsible use.
Global Health Trends: Creating a World Where Great Healthcare is Always Within Reach <[[https://forum.teladochealth.com/creating-a-world-where-great-healthcare-is-always-within-reach?&utm_source=marketo&utm_medium=email&utm_content=&utm_term=&utm_campaign=HEVT-202307-xSEG-FRM-LIVE-EVENT&utm_campaign_id=/]]> Hear from experts on the biggest trends in healthcare and the opportunity to address them in collaborative, optimistic ways.
Beyond Access: Advancing Health Equity with Virtual Care <[[https://forum.teladochealth.com/beyond-access-advancing-health-equity-with-virtual-care?&utm_source=marketo&utm_medium=email&utm_content=&utm_term=&utm_campaign=HEVT-202307-xSEG-FRM-LIVE-EVENT&utm_campaign_id=/]]> A panel of clinical leaders reveal the hidden components of health equity—experiences, quality, and outcomes—and how virtual care is uniquely positioned to improve access and reach.
Thank you for supporting Forum and we look forward to seeing you in Chicago next year! Interested in more? Check out our event content hub <[[https://forum.teladochealth.com/forum-2023-session-summaries?utm_source=marketo&utm_medium=email&utm_content=&utm_term=&utm_campaign=&utm_campaign_id=/&mkt_tok=MTM4LURSSC03MDcAAAGNUgKiE2m5iarNkCxAb2qu5_9ro87oGuZHCByberrGGrmUMlLTAcI1tWWcidxb2X3rFC7yU6rM7NfnPOJRFEU]]> for the full portfolio of session summaries and on-demand content. About Teladoc Health: Teladoc Health is transforming the healthcare experience and empowering people everywhere to live healthier lives. Recognized as the world leader in whole-person virtual care, Teladoc Health leverages more than a decade of expertise and data-driven insights to meet the growing virtual care needs of consumers and healthcare professionals.
